page.title: 05Typical Family Belongings
page.content: We investigated the possessions of the families in our area and worked out the average ownership of different items: Virtually 100% of families had a T.V. a vacuum cleaner, a refrigerator, and a washing machine. 80% had at least two T.V.s and about 60% had video recorders 90% had a tumble drier but only 35% had a dishwasher.60% had a deep freeze and 45% had a microwave oven as well as an ordinary oven. About 50% had a split level oven and 50% had a combined one. More than 90% of families had an electric mixer, half of these had a food processor and half had a bowl and stand type mixer. 50% of families had a computer 'though more were expecting to get one in the near future.45% had a fairly new "stacking" hi-fi system. N.B. We only investigated the families of children at our school, not the elderly etc.
